name: Honkers Wrist Wrasslin' World Tour
description:
Status

Projects current status is pending. This was a game jam game for ludum dare

Hoping to develop this concept further.

Description

Welcome to the international wrist wrestling championships. Fight your way across 3 continents to become the ultimate wrist wrestling champion.

Features
  • Be careful you don't over exert yourself in the process
Controls

Keyboard only supported: Alternate between z and x to beat your opponent

Minimum Specs

Chrome browser recommended

Special Thanks
  • F.J. - Sound / programming
  • D.F. - Art / programming
  • L.F. - Arm Model
